targets.query:
from(bucket: "payments")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "payment" and r._field == "amount")
  |> count()

success = from(bucket: "payments")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "payment" and r._field == "amount" and r.status == "success")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "success")

failed = from(bucket: "payments")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "payment" and r._field == "amount" and r.status == "failed")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "failed")

total = from(bucket: "payments")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "payment" and r._field == "amount")
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (float(v: success._value) / float(v: r._value)) * 100.0}))
  |> yield(name: "rate")

from(bucket: "payments")
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "payment" and r._field == "amount")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "payments")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "payment" and r._field == "processing_time")
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000.0}))

from(bucket: "payments")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "payment" and r._field == "amount")
  |> group(columns: ["customer_id"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)

list.name: customer_id
list.label: Customer
list.query:
from(bucket: "payments")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "payment")
  |> keep(columns: ["customer_id"])
  |> distinct(column: "customer_id")
